attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister should resign before he does even more damage to this country...education and the NHS are in disaray, Forces over stretched under paid and short of equipment, immigration or lack of, 10p tax and car tax fiascos, Fuel duty, Northern rock, MP's pay and allowences, MSP's voting on English laws...the list is endless, Brown should go now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
